title: Trump Offers Undocumented Immigrants $1,000 To Leave Country
description: President Donald Trump’s administration said that it is going to pay immigrants who are in the United States illegally and return to their home country voluntarily $1,000 as it pushes forward with its mass deportation agenda. What do you think? The post Trump Offers Undocumented Immigrants $1,000 To Leave Country appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: President Donald Trump’s administration said that it is going to pay immigrants who are in the United States illegally and return to their home country voluntarily $1,000 as it pushes forward with its mass deportation agenda. What do you think?
text: President Donald Trump’s administration said that it is going to pay immigrants who are in the United States illegally and return to their home country voluntarily $1,000 as it pushes forward with its mass deportation agenda. What do you think? “I’d rather get that in a more stable currency, if possible.” Calvin Sutton, Boat Namer “When Donald Trump promises to pay you, you know he’s telling the truth.” Tyler Tsang, Lid Twister “Ah, the ol’ Reverse Melania.” Agnes Pierson, Kerchief Knotter Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. html:
President Donald Trump’s administration said that it is going to pay immigrants who are in the United States illegally and return to their home country voluntarily $1,000 as it pushes forward with its mass deportation agenda. What do you think?

“I’d rather get that in a more stable currency, if possible.”

Calvin Sutton, Boat Namer

“When Donald Trump promises to pay you, you know he’s telling the truth.”

Tyler Tsang, Lid Twister

“Ah, the ol’ Reverse Melania.”

Agnes Pierson, Kerchief Knotter
